notifications.title: Just a Hello World
notifications.message: Since you ARE MettaCode. Just sending a test

notifications.title: Just A Test
notifications.message: just a test for start date sorting

notifications.title: iOS GoFundMe
notifications.message: To help with funding for development of an iOS version of US Congress app, we're running a GoFundMe campaign. Contact us for details or search 'us congress app' on the GoFundMe website at https://gofundme.com

notifications.title: Ready For Premium?
notifications.message: If you're not yet ready to upgrade and haven't used your one-time free trial, our Free Premium Days promotion will soon be here where you can try out all app features!

notifications.title: Follow The Market
notifications.message: Keep track of what stocks and commodities congressional members are trading! Premium members receive trade disclosure information and alerts. Consider upgrading today!

notifications.title: Shop Cool Merch
notifications.message: Trade in your credits and shop for cool non-partisan products in the merch shop.

notifications.title: Earn App Credits
notifications.message: Get permanent credits when you share US Congress App with friends & colleagues, rate the app, or purchase them directly when prompted.

notifications.title: Fine Tune App Notifications
notifications.message: Getting too many (or not enough) notifications? Activate (or deactivate) any of them from the [Settings] tile on the main side menu!
